creditline: The Marilyn C. Benson Endowment for Art Acquisition
description: central roundel of Saint Matthew holding the gospel in the form of a scroll with a diminutive kneeling angel, set against a verdant landscape and blue sky; framed by elaborate goldwork embroider of silver- and gilt-thread strapwork terminating in scrolls
title: Embroidered apparel from a dalmatic depicting Saint Matthew and the Angel
